text: Hi! After making changes to my repo, I open up Julia REPL and run `serve()` after importing Franklin. Is this possible without launching the REPL and doing it directly on the CLI?

elements.text: Hi! After making changes to my repo, I open up Julia REPL and run
after importing Franklin. Is this possible without launching the REPL and doing it directly on the CLI?

text: There is a CLI generated via ComonIcon.jl <https://github.com/JuliaCLI/FranklinCLI.jl> made by <@UC6SUUPRC> ; I personally don’t have much experience with it
